snippet.title: Coldridge - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the new Coldridge Gameplay Trailer to discover the mysteries of this strategic turn-based exploration game set in the mystical Wild West. 

Strategically plan your moves to navigate cursed terrains, uncover magical artifacts, and explore uncharted lands. Don't be fooled by the calm plains of Coldridge, take a gamble and unveil its mysteries!

Play the new Steam Next Fest demo now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3052500/ColdRidge/

Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/yBzZrQgG7K
